About

Hi! My name is Kendrick. I’m currently doing a Bachelors of IT at Queensland University of Technology. I’m a big functional programming fan and I think types should be a mandatory feature in every language. I’m also an enthusiast in the machine learning and blockchain space. In my spare time I like to work on my side projects (which can be found on GitHub), play squash, and socialize (occasaionlly). I’m currently running Ubuntu simply because of the convinience and the community, but I would really like to switch to NixOS. My languages of choice are Haskell, and Python, I also prefer to code using Vim and Visual Studio Code.

I enjoy meeting people from different backgrounds as they often surprise me with interesting perspectives on things, so feel free to send me an email if you would like to chat just about anything.

kendricktan0814 at gmail.com
